name: Phototagger
tagline: A javascript-based implementation of an online photo-tagging service, similar to Facebook's tagging functionality.  It is similar to backbone in its implementation, but the framework is generated solely from javascript and jquery, without a pre-generated javascript framework. A basic Rails setup provides the persistence layer.
body:
### Photo-tagger

A javascript-based implementation of an online photo-tagging service, similar to Facebook's tagging functionality. It is similar to backbone in its implementation, but the framework is generated solely from javascript and jquery, without a pre-generated javascript framework. A basic Rails setup provides the persistence layer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
